column4: hi guy's. I'm going to be bringing my personal laptop to work tomorrow and I want to be able to connect to my work domain. They have windows2003 server. How do I do it? I'm currently running Ubuntu 7.04
hi guy's. I'm going to be bringing my personal laptop to work tomorrow and I want to be able to connect to my work's domain. How do I do it? I'm currently running Ubuntu 7.04. any help would be great
afaik, for full functionality you must have a user account on the domain -> ask your sysadmin
